ja537:18.4.pli: na so bhuñji na so pivi.

ja537:30.2.pli: Na puttadāraṃ na dhanaṃ na raṭṭhaṃ;

ja537:34.3.pli: Na hi taṃ naraṃ tāyati duggatīhi,

ja537:35.2.pli: Cando ca suriyo ca chamā pateyyuṃ;

ja537:40.4.pli: Yā me sutā assu hitāya brahme”.

ja537:49.4.pli: Na hi tāta dhammesu mamatthi titti.

ja537:56.4.pli: Dhammo ca adhammo ca kuhiṃ sameti.

ja537:58.4.pli: Kasmā no adhammikaṃ brūsi maṃ tvaṃ”.

ja537:64.4.pli: Na hi nūna te maraṇabhayaṃ janinda;

ja537:67.1.pli: Pitā ca mātā ca upaṭṭhitā me,

ja537:68.1.pli: Pitā ca mātā ca upaṭṭhitā me,

ja537:95.4.pli: Taṃ te varaṃ kinti mahaṃ dadāmi”.

ja537:96.4.pli: Iccabravī tvaṃ na hi te sameti”.

ja537:97.4.pli: Taṃ te varaṃ kinti mahaṃ dadeyyaṃ”.

ja537:103.1.pli: Satthā ca me hosi sakhā ca mesi,

ja537:104.1.pli: “Satthā ca te homi sakhā ca tyamhi,

ja537:107.4.pli: Tumhe ca vo hotha yatheva puttā”.

ja537:121.2.pli: Na so sakhā yo sakhāraṃ jināti;

ja537:121.3.pli: Na sā bhariyā yā patino na vibheti,

ja537:121.4.pli: Na te puttā ye na bharanti jiṇṇaṃ.

ja537:122.1.pli: Na sā sabhā yattha na santi santo,

ja537:122.2.pli: Na te santo ye na bhaṇanti dhammaṃ;
